name: favit Network
tag_list: social-media, rss, rss-rader, stream-reader, social-bookmarking, lifestream
overview:
Since November 2008 the favit team has been developing a powerful and innovative real-time content streamer that centralizes and unifies the access to content, its consumption and management. favit delivers happiness by making the access to the content people really care about, simple and time effective.

At favit we have combined the best of the two worlds - the one of computer logics and filters and the other - of human curated streams, after all FAVIT is all about common people interacting through content. That’s why favit is going beyond the technology and aims to create a platform where the two big interest groups get together: the users that desire interest centered, credible, well distilled information and users, user groups and businesses that are interested in and capable of providing these streams.

The beauty of favit is that it provides a win-win situation where consumers create their own streams but also easily subscribe to streams created and curated (branded) by others. The result is that the users are happy since they receive content that satisfies their interests and needs, they also use favit as a productivity tool, a source of knowledge or entertainment, while the curators engage target communities through well distilled, interest centric content streams, which are by no means intrusive, on the contrary - they are loved by the crowd.
